project.title: “Que cosa es ser negra?”: Afro-Peruvian Women’s Narratives in Black Documentaries
project.description: This research centers on the ways Afro-Peruvian women narrate their lives, identities, and histories in Black documentaries from Peru. Drawing from Black feminist theory, this research project understands Afro-Peruvian women as knowledge producers who articulate their meanings through their lived experiences and memories. I approach documentary films as audiovisual archives in which Afro-Peruvian women's lives are mediated, narrated, and sometimes erased by Peru's gender and racial politics.
project.creator: p-caceres-c
